title: Increase lesson video upload limit to 100MB (frontend)

requirements.summary: Raise lesson video upload size limit to 100MB in frontend validation/file-reading utilities and update Upload Lesson page helper text to reflect 100MB.
acceptanceCriteria: Selecting a valid video file up to 100 MB passes validation in validateVideoFile().
Selecting a video file larger than 100 MB is rejected with an error message that clearly states the 100 MB limit (English).
fileToUint8Array() allows reading files up to 100 MB by default (without requiring callers to pass a custom maxSizeBytes).
UploadLessonPage displays the correct max size (100MB) anywhere it currently mentions 10MB (e.g., CardDescription and helper text).

file_operations.description: Update the default maxSizeBytes in fileToUint8Array() from 10MB to 100MB and adjust the thrown error message formatting to clearly state a 100 MB limit when exceeded. Update validateVideoFile() size check from 10MB to 100MB and update the returned validation error text to say the file must be under 100 MB (English).
Update all user-facing max-size helper text from 10MB to 100MB (including CardDescription and the video file helper paragraph) so the Upload Lesson page consistently communicates the new 100MB limit.
